It's a hard puzzler but it does have a good story and fair puzzles to it.

One of my favorite games to return to. I don't breeze through it, either; remembering a chamber and knowing how to solve it are two different things for me. The story, humor, remarkable lack of blood and violence for a first-person "shooter" (of course you can die, though)--everything just comes together to make one of the best game sequels of all time.
